availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John A. Reid (Shelby County, Ky, farmer)

body.p: Shelby County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Mattie E. Bryant Reid. Father of Oliver Reid and Cyrus Reid. Farmer in Shelby County, Kentucky, in 1860. Owned eighteen enslaved persons in Shelby County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Shelby County, District 1, p. 210.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Shelby County, District 1,, p. 265B.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Shelby County, District 1, p. 390A.
